name: River the Hunter
description:
This game was made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021. Game autosave everytime you end a level. And Yes there is some sort of story I guess 0.o or not ?

CONTROLS

[W][A][S][D] keys to move

{SPACE] to select and advance conversation.

[R] Manual Reload.

Scroll to change weapon.

Left Mouse Click to fire basic projectile

Mouse to aim
